Deubff NPCs

CureMode

combobox.name: cbCureCurseGroupMember
combobox.Width:
120 20 Select the OTHER character to cure, select No One to disable curing others.
Script[EQ2Bot].Variable[CureCurseGroupMember]:Set[${LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}].FindSetting[CureCurseGroupMember]}] This:AddItem[${LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}].FindSetting[CureCurseGroupMember]}] This.ItemByValue[${LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}].FindSetting[CureCurseGroupMember]}]:Select
Script[EQ2Bot].Variable[CureCurseGroupMember]:Set[${This.SelectedItem.Text}] LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}]:AddSetting[CureCurseGroupMember,${This.SelectedItem.Text}] Script[EQ2Bot].VariableScope.EQ2Bot:Save_Settings
Script[EQ2Bot].VariableScope.EQ2Bot:RefreshList[${This.FullName},CureCurseGroupMember,0,0,1]
